metadata.Title: CVE-2017-7508 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
OpenVPN versions before 2.4.3 and before 2.3.17 are vulnerable to remote denial-of-service when receiving malformed IPv6 packet.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-7508` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

openvpn - 2.3.2-7ubuntu3.2
No subscription required

notes.Note: leosilva> same as debian wheezy for precise-esm it's not affected
